languages.text: {n}Ирлиэт прикрывает глаза, и веки ее дрожат от сдерживаемых эмоций.{/n} "Когда-то очень давно старый друг сказал мне: "Птица не осознает важности своих перьев, пока не лишается дара вновь обуздать ветер". Теперь я, кажется, понимаю".

traits.locale_text: {n}Ирлиэт прикрывает глаза, и веки ее дрожат от сдерживаемых эмоций.{/n} "Когда-то очень давно старый друг сказал мне: "Птица не осознает важности своих перьев, пока не лишается дара вновь обуздать ветер". Теперь я, кажется, понимаю".

languages.text: {n}Yrliet half closes her eyes, her lids fluttering from suppressed emotion.{/n} "A very long time ago, an old friend once told me, 'A bird does not know its feathers' worth until it loses the gift of harnessing the wind.' I think I understand now."
languages.original_text: {n}Ирлиэт прикрывает глаза, и веки ее дрожат от сдерживаемых эмоций.{/n} "Когда-то очень давно старый друг сказал мне: "Птица не осознает важности своих перьев, пока не лишается дара вновь обуздать ветер". Теперь я, кажется, понимаю".

{n}Yrliet half closes her eyes, her lids fluttering from suppressed emotion.{/n} "A very long time ago, an old friend once told me, 'A bird does not know its feathers' worth until it loses the gift of harnessing the wind.' I think I understand now."

{n}Yrliet half closes her eyes, her lids fluttering from suppressed emotion.{/n} "A very long time ago, an old friend once told me, 'A bird does not know its feathers' worth until it loses the gift of harnessing the wind.' I think I understand now."

{n}Yrliet half closes her eyes, her lids fluttering from suppressed emotion.{/n} "A very long time ago, an old friend once told me, 'A bird does not know its feathers' worth until it loses the gift of harnessing the wind.' I think I understand now."

languages.text: {n}伊莉耶特半闭着眼睛，努力地压抑着情绪。她的眼睑不住地跳动着。{/n}“很久以前，一位老友曾对我说过这样的话。‘鸟儿只有失去了驾驭狂风的力量，才能意识到羽毛的价值。’我想，我现在理解这句话的意思了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet half closes her eyes, her lids fluttering from suppressed emotion.{/n} "A very long time ago, an old friend once told me, 'A bird does not know its feathers' worth until it loses the gift of harnessing the wind.' I think I understand now."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊莉耶特半闭着眼睛，努力地压抑着情绪。她的眼睑不住地跳动着。{/n}“很久以前，一位老友曾对我说过这样的话。‘鸟儿只有失去了驾驭狂风的力量，才能意识到羽毛的价值。’我想，我现在理解这句话的意思了。”

languages.text: {n}Yrliet entrecierra los ojos, y sus pestañas tiemblan con emoción reprimida.{/n} «Hace mucho tiempo, un viejo amigo me dijo: "Los pájaros no conocen el valor de sus plumas hasta que pierde el don de surcar el viento". Creo que ahora entiendo sus palabras».
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet half closes her eyes, her lids fluttering from suppressed emotion.{/n} "A very long time ago, an old friend once told me, 'A bird does not know its feathers' worth until it loses the gift of harnessing the wind.' I think I understand now."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet entrecierra los ojos, y sus pestañas tiemblan con emoción reprimida.{/n} «Hace mucho tiempo, un viejo amigo me dijo: "Los pájaros no conocen el valor de sus plumas hasta que pierde el don de surcar el viento". Creo que ahora entiendo sus palabras».

languages.text: {n}ユリエットは目を半分閉じ、感情の抑圧により細かくまばたきをする。{/n}「昔、旧友に”鳥は風を利用する才能を失って初めて、羽根の価値を知る”と言われた。今ならわかる気がする」
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet half closes her eyes, her lids fluttering from suppressed emotion.{/n} "A very long time ago, an old friend once told me, 'A bird does not know its feathers' worth until it loses the gift of harnessing the wind.' I think I understand now."

traits.locale_text: {n}ユリエットは目を半分閉じ、感情の抑圧により細かくまばたきをする。{/n}「昔、旧友に”鳥は風を利用する才能を失って初めて、羽根の価値を知る”と言われた。今ならわかる気がする」

languages.text: {n}Yrliet schließt die Augen halb. Ihre Lider zittern vor unterdrückter Emotion.{/n} "Vor sehr langer Zeit hat mir einmal ein alter Freund etwas gesagt: 'Ein Vogel kennt den Wert seiner Federn erst, wenn er die Gabe verliert, den Wind zu nutzen.' Ich glaube, ich verstehe es jetzt."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet half closes her eyes, her lids fluttering from suppressed emotion.{/n} "A very long time ago, an old friend once told me, 'A bird does not know its feathers' worth until it loses the gift of harnessing the wind.' I think I understand now."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet schließt die Augen halb. Ihre Lider zittern vor unterdrückter Emotion.{/n} "Vor sehr langer Zeit hat mir einmal ein alter Freund etwas gesagt: 'Ein Vogel kennt den Wert seiner Federn erst, wenn er die Gabe verliert, den Wind zu nutzen.'" Ich glaube, ich verstehe es jetzt."

languages.text: {n}Yrliet ferme à moitié les yeux et ses paupières palpitent d'une émotion contenue.{/n} « Voilà bien longtemps, un vieil ami m'a dit : "Un oiseau ne comprend la valeur de ses plumes que le jour où il devient incapable de dompter le vent." Je crois que je comprends enfin ce que cela signifie. »
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet half closes her eyes, her lids fluttering from suppressed emotion.{/n} "A very long time ago, an old friend once told me, 'A bird does not know its feathers' worth until it loses the gift of harnessing the wind.' I think I understand now."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet ferme à moitié les yeux et ses paupières palpitent d'une émotion contenue.{/n} « Voilà bien longtemps, un vieil ami m'a dit : "Un oiseau ne comprend la valeur de ses plumes que le jour où il devient incapable de dompter le vent." Je crois que je comprends enfin ce que cela signifie. »

languages.text: {n}Yrliet, gözlerini kısmen yumuyor. Göz kapakları, bastırdığı duygular yüzünden kımıldanıyor.{/n} "Çok uzun bir zaman önce, eski bir dostum bana demişti ki kuşlar, rüzgârdan faydalanamayacak hâle gelene kadar tüylerinin değerini bilmezmiş. Sanırım artık anlıyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet half closes her eyes, her lids fluttering from suppressed emotion.{/n} "A very long time ago, an old friend once told me, 'A bird does not know its feathers' worth until it loses the gift of harnessing the wind.' I think I understand now."
